name: GravitEx Business
tag_list: ricoh, aficio, priport, ricoh-pro, mfp, copier, printer, scanner, fax
overview:
• wholesale and retail trade in office cars, computers and peripherals
  • sale of copy equipment, sale of expendables and filling of cartridges
  • maintenance and repair of office cars and computer facilities during the guarantee and postguarantee period;
  • the other activity connected with service of office cars and computer facilities
